column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Recently went here for the first time and this review is solely based on their appetizers because I have yet to try the ramen! Yes I know a ramen joint and I didn't even get to eat the ramen
column2: but I will be back for it. The takoyaki was a hit. Pretty good and the dough was fluffy
column3: just wished there was more meat in it. The tempura Brussels sprouts were mediocre
column5: tasted sweet like same dip for everything else. The truffle fries were good
column6: well the fries with truffle ketchup. Basic but I enjoyed it. Service was good
column7: and now it's time for me to come back to try their ramen. Â I'd give it more of a 3.5/5
